declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: I confirm that I will administer the estate of SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN, according to law. I will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court

declaration.understandItem1: my application will be rejected if I do not answer any questions about the information I have given
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against me if I am found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information you’ve given in your application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.deceased: SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN was born on 1 January 1900 and died on 2 February 2000, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.applicant: I, TestFN TestLN of 120 Caulfield Road London E6 2DG, make the following statement:

executorsApplying.name: I, TestFN TestLN, an executor named in the will or codicils as diff TestFN TestLN, am applying for probate. My name is different because: Other Reason.
executorsApplying.sign: I will send to the probate registry what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN.

legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
legalStatement.deceasedOtherNames: They were also known as dafdsad ssfsdfa and dsafsda dafsfa.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £3443434 and the net value for the estate amounts to £343434.

headers: In the High Court of Justice

declarationItems.title: I, TestFN TestLN of 120 Caulfield Road London E6 2DG, make the following statement:
SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN was born on 1 January 1900 and died on 2 February 2000, domiciled in England and Wales. They were also known as dafdsad ssfsdfa and dsafsda dafsfa.

sections.title: The estate of the person who died

declarationItems.title: The gross value for the estate amounts to £3443434 and the net value for the estate amounts to £343434.

To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
I, TestFN TestLN, an executor named in the will or codicils as diff TestFN TestLN, am applying for probate. My name is different because: Other Reason.
I will send to the probate registry what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN.
I confirm that I will administer the estate of SingleExeCaseDataFN SingleExeCaseDataLN, according to law. I will:
values: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
keep a full account of how the estate has been administered

declarationItems.title: If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
values: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
return the grant of probate to the court

declarationItems.title: I understand that:
values: my application will be rejected if I do not answer any questions about the information I have given
criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against me if I am found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest
